title: The Yellow Emperor is the mythical founder of the school of Daoism in ancient China. Its system of divination depended on the manipulation of the yin–yang dichotomy

Nakamura presents a thorough scholarly review of the problems related to the introduction of Buddhism into Japanese society, along with a complete and heavily annotated translation of the Nihon ryōiki . I am greatly indebted to this book for much of the material in my own translation of the same text
